page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content: There is{a bus from Mount to Plymouth. It leaves Mount at about 12 o'clock on Saturday. There is a bus from Cardinham also going to Plymouth. It goes around 10:15 and returns at 6:30 in the evening.The colour of the bus is a sort of maroon and belongs to Webbers.The scool bus goes from Warleggan to Mount to Cardinham and then to Bodmin at 8:15 and the colour is blue.I have{to walk to school. There are 3 people that walk to school because we all live in the village.Most children in our school use transport because they live in other villages or on farms.26 children come by car, 18 come by bus, and 3 come by taxi.{People living in the {country need their own transport.
